Neural FAQ

How accurate is the AI lead scoring?

Our quantum neural networks achieve 95.7% accuracy using Deepseek AI, trained on 2.4M+ successful lead conversions.

Can I upgrade or downgrade anytime?

Yes! Changes take effect immediately. Upgrades are prorated, downgrades apply at next billing cycle.

What integrations are supported?

Apollo.io, Audience Labs, LinkedIn, n8n workflows, ElevenLabs, Supabase, and 50+ enterprise APIs.

Do you offer enterprise discounts?

Yes! Enterprise plans include volume discounts, custom SLAs, and dedicated success managers.
